Table of Contents

Name

manybody - a meta package of many n-body like codes

Description

manybody was an effort to bring together various activities related to simulations of stellar systems, starting with the MODEST collaboration.

In earlier workshops the manybody manual was used to give examples how different packages could be used.

A more modern approach developed out of MODEST, and eventually became AMUSE.

See Also


http://www.manybody.org
http://www.amusecode.org
$NEMO/text/manybody

Caveat

New codes have not been included, notably AMUSE
